functions.tag: {CustomModelData:80,display:{Name:'{"translate":"青 眼 の 〇 龍 ","color":"blue","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"translate":"高い攻撃力を誇る伝説のドラゴン。","color":"white","italic":false}','{"translate":"どんな相手でも粉砕する、その破壊力は計り知れない。","color":"white","italic":false}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"S","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" サモンE：スーパードラゴン"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"召喚士",SkillID:608,Name:"サモンEスーパードラゴン",Level:1,Interval:120,Trigger:"手に持って右クリック",Count:1},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:1050,Operation:0,UUID:[I;22,0,0,40],Slot:"chest"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"カスタム",Amount:1750,Operation:0,UUID:[I;22,0,0,60],Slot:"chest"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:4,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:1.2,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,50],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
